page.title: 16THE VET
page.content: Mr Barnes is his own boss.He does not have to go in to work at any specific time,as long as he is there in time for surgery. {Three vets share the practice.}Two of the vets may move on later.There are two assistants and Mrs Barnes.They help to hold animals and write notes on cards.{The vets work 9.00 am to {about 9.00 pm.Unless they are on night {duty.Usualy work 130_140 hours in a {week.Half of their work is with {small animals. { Mr Barnes works within 25 miles of {his surgery.}His furthest client lives in York.Some of the farmers move to different farms,but they like to keep the same vet.In the surgery he has a small sterilizing kettle,a little x_ray machine,he cannot afford all the equipment he would like.{There is no N.H.S. for animals.
